doc:
Merle Dandridge https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Merle_Dandridge 0 Merle Dandridge (born May 31, 1975) is an American actress and singer who performed in a number of stage productions, including Broadway musicals Jesus Christ Superstar, Spamalot, and Rent. She is widely known for her role as Alyx Vance in the Half Life 2 game. Dandridge is also known for her recurring role on television series such as Sons of Anarchy and The Night Shift. In 2016, she began starring as Grace Greenleaf in the Oprah Winfrey Network drama series, Greenleaf. She was the actor for Papa Ge in the 2017 revival of Once on this Island, until January 8, 2018, so she could shoot her television show Greenleaf. Merle_Dandridge ( born May_31_,_1975 ) is an_American_actress and singer who performed in a_number of stage_productions , including Broadway_musicals_Jesus_Christ_Superstar , Spamalot , and Rent . She is_widely_known for her_role as Alyx_Vance in the_Half_Life 2_game . Dandridge is_also_known for her_recurring_role on television_series such_as Sons of Anarchy and The_Night_Shift . In 2016 , she began_starring as Grace_Greenleaf in the_Oprah_Winfrey_Network_drama_series , Greenleaf . She was the_actor for Papa_Ge in the_2017_revival of Once on this_Island , until January_8_,_2018 , so she could_shoot her_television_show_Greenleaf .
